title: Blacks Law 2nd Ed ULTIMATE USER FRIENDLY
description:
I downloaded a monochrome version of the 2nd ed, ran a OCR through it, the result is that in Adobe Reader all you have to do is in the search-box, click the small arrow pointing downwards and enable "Case sensitivity",

Now you can input a heading, like "LAWFUL" and within two or three pushes of the Enter-button you can have all the occult law shit at your finger tips.

Ohh.. Life is sweet. Peace
